title: Extra Bonus RP headed your way for a limited time!

replies.body: Now I can buy that RP that is going to make me and the rest of my family homeless, and be like my favorite champion:D {{champion:157}}
thts funny as hell
Don't laugh, is a very serious problem league players are facing right now.
I logged in just to upvote this comment
well yeah, you cant really upvote it if you dont log in and even then theres no downside to being logged in am i right
stop clearing your browser than you wont have to log in everytime
B-but hell really isn't that funny.
how do u know have u been?
{{champion:17}} feeding it is as close as we will ever get
And I just bought RP for Harrowing skins too... I swear Riot is like a vacuum for my money ;-;
They know exactly what they're doing. -_-

It's better than last year. They waited until after the holidays to give double bonus RP. After you already gave your soul to gift friends for Snowdown. 

It'll only cost half a soul this year. :) {{item:3041}}
So in Canada we might actually be able to afford a skin for $10? Amazing! /s (pls government, fix dollar)
Well, I hope trudeau makes some real change... so we can actually afford a good skin {{summoner:3}}
lol. good luck with that
At least he's legalizing some of dat dank kush. {{champion:104}}  {{champion:104}} (graves can't have a cigar)
if u put a VPN on and redeem a code u get extra cuz it thinks ur in the US

Just to clarify this doesn't actually work.

From experience -- 
Winning many giveaways on twitch.  
When redeeming a US RP Card it'll show it as USD when redeeming.  
When redeeming a CA RP Card it'll show it as CAD when redeeming.
Time for the people with money to buy Rp... I dislike people with money xD
I dislike being 14 too... but you'll have money soon enough ;)
...which you'll spend on League. :\
SAME, 14 year old problems xD

I wish that this Christmas there was away to earn RP without needing to buy it, even if it was enough for just one good skin or two crappy skins.
pls Riot, think of the poor
Riot, you really should look into this, maybe a number of matches/spent.  Throw some kids a bone
It's like you guys don't understand one day in the near future you will be able to get free skins. Rarely but you still can. Just wait
How?
Did you not read the post where you can get chests and keys and they will get you free champs or skins etc?

I know they are doing the key and chest thing but if they made special skins ( something simpler like a color change, even a hat) they could give those to people who achieve high masteries like rank 8, 9, or 10.
so basically give the chroma packs to people who have high champion mastery? I agree 100%

$100 CAD - 13600 RP (10400 + 1600 standard bonus RP + 1600 extra bonus RP)
Just so we're clear {{summoner:3}}

100 usd rp is 130 rp per usd. the bonus is based of 15% of the base rp. for the event its doubled. considering 1 cad=.75 usd. the canadians look like they are paying more, but they are actually paying less. since 100 cad is 75 usd, it should reward 9750 base rp, but instead it awards an extra 650 base rp+ the additional bonus %. so it is the usd payers who are being {{summoner:3}}
WTF is math....
basically, 100 usd=130 rp per 1 usd, while 100 cad is 138.6 rp per usd.

that 3.2k bonus for 100$ that means it 100$+20$ LOL WURF ASF
{{item:3142}} Worf as much as this guy
Of course I just bought some RP not knowing there was a bonus coming up.  Money in my wallet.....aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaand it's gone.
Man do i love bonus rp. Im literally going to buy all the {{champion:103}} Skins :D

or just buy one because once you get attached to a single favorite, the others never get used. yasuo is my favorite champ and i own both skins but i never use project because i like high noon so much.
you mean fedora tipper...{{champion:157}}

I use different skins for different situations. For example, I use Vandal Vlad in the bot lane because I'm a rebel. And, I use Nosferatu Vlad in the top lane because I lurk in the shadows for the majority of the game. Finally, I use Blood Lord Vlad in the mid lane. Because quite honestly, I feel like the motherf***ing epitome of the lord of blood and carnage, when I demolish in that lane.
Well there goes the money i saved up for fallout {{summoner:3}}

Nah man! Don't give in. Get Fallout it's way more worth.* 

*(in my honest personal opinion)
Do the 50$ cards get the rp bonus ? i don't have a credit card so i used to use a prepaid vanilla visa to buy RP on the client, but i would love to buy 50$ league cards for extra RP
oh whoops it says right there on the 50$ sorry you can downvote me now
Just cause sword of the occult wasnt used in the lcs you remove it???? wtf
ok uberdanger

I guarantee that out of all League players, Uberdanger wasn't the only one to use it. I used it a lot. They popularized the high risk high reward 5man playstyle, but people've been doing it for years. And that it got removed is really shitty.

But the one thing nobody's talking about.. GIVE ZEPHYR BACK.
When all the christmas skins aren't your main {{champion:32}}

for some reason i expected it to be higher bonus RP.

correct me if i am wrong, but weren't these RP sales much more generous?
Wait does the 50 $ prepaid card work with the extra bonus?
It should. They put in bold letters that all prepaid cards would get the bonus RP
